price: 难道能造天地的，不能造像他们那样的人吗？不然！他确是善造的，确是全知的。
arabic: أَوَلَيۡسَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ بِقَٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يَخۡلُقَ مِثۡلَهُمۚ بَلَىٰ وَهُوَ ٱلۡخَلَّٰقُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: awalaysa alladhī khalaqa al-samāwāti wal-arḍa biqādirin ʿalā an yakhluqa mith'lahum balā wahuwa al-khalāqu al-ʿalīmu
